title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 71.3 - Special vehicle identification numbers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 71.3 - Special vehicle identification numbers

State Regulations

Upon application of the owner, the commissioner shall cause
an examination of a vehicle to be had. If the vehicle is not stolen, and does
not contain stolen parts, and if the applicant has proof of ownership, a
special vehicle identification number will be affixed to the vehicle. If the
vehicle requires a title, a new title with the special vehicle identification
number will be issued. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
71.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
